search.description: Enter the product name, company name, INN or type / activity

bannerMain.title: Showcase of investment projects
bannerMain.text: A free service for searching and comparing investment projects of different industries and stages of development. Find projects or present your own

draft.title: You have a draft application for placing an investment project on the storefront. Don't forget to complete the filling and submit the project for review.

new.title: Looking for investors?
new.text: Submit an application for placing your project on the showcase so that Russian and foreign companies can see it

hiding.hide: Hide the project from the catalog
hiding.show: Show the project in the catalog

similar.title: Similar projects according to your request

text.checkContact: To receive a business plan and presentation, request project contacts
text.checkAuth: To receive a business plan and presentation, log in to the platform

error.notFound: The requested files were not found

app.title: Application for inclusion in the register of investment products

list.1: Acceptance of the application for consideration
list.2: Review of the application for correctness and completeness of information
list.3: Publication of the project on the showcase or return for revision

error.default: The field must be filled in

inn.default: The entered value is not an INN
inn.count: The INN can consist only of {{max}} digits

email.latin: Only Latin letters and numbers are allowed
email.symbolCount: Enter an email of less than {{length}} characters

file.format: File {{name}} was not attached. Wrong format.
file.sizeMax: File {{name}} was not attached. Invalid maximum file size
file.sizeMin: File {{name}} was not attached. Invalid minimum file size

error.latin: Only Latin letters and numbers are allowed
error.checkbox: To send an application, fill in all required fields on the page
error.agreement: You have not given consent to the processing of data, it is impossible to send an application without it

operation.dropOrSelect: Drag the file here or select it on your computer

fullAccess.title: Full access required
fullAccess.text: To access the service, you need to log in through the Public Services portal. Other services and government support measures will also be available to you.

hide.title: Are you sure you want to hide the project from the catalog?
hide.text: If you hide a project, other users will not see it in the project list

remove.title: Are you sure you want to delete the project from the catalog?
remove.text: After deletion, your project will disappear from the catalog and will not be available for restoration

removeAll.title: Do you want to delete everything?
removeAll.text: The entire list will be deleted

save.title: Filled in data will not be saved
save.text: Click Save if you want to return to the filling later

notSave.title: The completed data will not be saved
notSave.text: Click "Do not save" if you want to leave the page

registered.title: This action is not available now

rejected.title: This action is not available now

cards.title: Nothing was found for your query
cards.text: Try to change the search parameters or reset the filters

overview.title: The overview is still in the process of accumulation
overview.text: We suggest to return later or add your investment project

projects.title: You don't have any projects right now
projects.text: Project applications that you have started creating or have already completed will appear here

favorites.title: There's nothing here yet
favorites.text: You haven't added any projects to your favorites yet. Go to the showcase to find projects that interest you and add them to your favorites

compare.title: There's nothing here yet
compare.text: You haven't added any projects to the comparison yet. Go to the showcase to find projects you're interested in and add them to your comparison list

detail.contact: Your contacts will be available to other users upon request

data.text: Your data is uploaded automatically from a Single personal account ROSCONGRESS. Their correction is possible only in it.
